The wait was over. \nShuri's stage clothes were finally ready.%K%P
'You'll look like a real Divine Idol now!'%K%P
The girls hadn't looked bad in their uniforms,\nbut this outfit would make Shuri look all the\nmore authentic.%K%P
'But come on, hurry it up a little. \nHow long are you going to take changing?'%K%P
Kagura ran out of patience\nand tried to barge in on Shuri.%K%P
But at that moment Sara returned\nfrom helping Shuri change.%K%P
'Thanks for waiting, you two. \nWe're all done in here.'%K%P
'So, where's the lady of the hour?'%K%P
'She won't come out. She says she's too embarrassed. \nThere must be a way to convince her. Any ideas?'%K%P
'Okay! Then I'll use my dancing\nto entice Shuri out!'%K%P
'Well, you are Ame no Uzume, after all.'%K%P
The old legends say that when Amaterasu shut herself\naway in a cave, Ame no Uzume danced so beautifully\nthat the sun goddess was tempted back into the world.%K%P
So perhaps Kagura's moves could even drag out\nthe suddenly shy Shuri.%K%P
'Here I go...'%K%P
Kagura took hold of the hem of her\nuniform's skirt.%K%P
'Whoa, whoa, what are you doing?'%K%P
'I have to be wearing my goddess clothes to infuse my\ndance with Jinriki, otherwise it won't work so well.'%K%P
'But you're a goddess, shouldn't you be able to use\nlike, magic or something to change your clothes\ninstantly?'%K%P
That's what Sara always did. I looked to her for\nhelp, but she shook her head apologetically.%K%P
'Not all the gods can do that.'%K%P
'I'm not as amazing as Sara,\nso I have to get changed normally.'%K%P
Kagura rummaged around in her bag\nand brought out her outfit.%K%P
She looked more like a cosplayer than a goddess.%K%P
'Wait, you're not gonna change here, are you?'%K%P
'Sure, why not? It's not like I'm going to get\ntotally naked. Doesn't bother me.'%K%P
As she spoke, Kagura started to strip.%K%P
'Stop! Please, don't take off any more.'%K%P
'No way!'%K%P
'Shuri, please come out!\nYou're the only one who can stop her now!'%K%P
Kagura wasn't listening to us anymore,\nso I shouted through the door to Shuri for help.%K%P
'Urgh, what are you doing now...?'%K%P
It wasn't what we'd planned,\nbut Kagura did make Shuri show herself.%K%P
'D-don't stare at me like that. \nYou're making me self conscious.'%K%P
Shuri's stage clothes showed a lot\nmore skin than I'd expected.%K%P
That said, it wasn't obscene in any way.\nIt had kind of a mystic feel about it.%K%P
'I think it successfully expresses\nher goddess aspect, don't you?'%K%P
The outfit was unlike Sara's or Kagura's,\na design totally unique to Shuri.%K%P
In her uniform she could probably be mistaken\nfor a human, but in this outfit her divinity was\nclear for everyone to see.%K%P
'Come on, say something.'%K%P
'Okay, Okay. Uh... I think it's... Well...'%K%P
'Does it look weird?'%K%P
'No, it looks great on you.'%K%P
Giving her a straight up complement felt awkward.\nThat was the best I could come up with.%K%P
Shuri's sex appeal had shot through the roof.\nThere was just something really attractive about it.%K%P
'R-really? It's not too revealing, is it?'%K%P
'No, of course not. \nDivine Idol stage outfits are meant to be like this.'%K%P
'Yeah, it's awesome!' \nWay more sexy than mine!'%K%P
'What?'%K%P
'Hey, we were trying to avoid using that word...'%K%P
'Huh? Why? It's a good thing.'%K%P
In Kagura's world, sexy is justice.%K%P
I wouldn't say I disagree, but this wasn't\nthe time to bring it up.%K%P
'I knew it! This is indecent!'%K%P
Shuri looked even more embarrassed than before.%K%P
'There's nothing wrong with it. All your fans\nare gonna love seeing you show off your sexy side!'%K%P
'No way! Not happening!'%K%P
Kagura was doing her best to be supportive,\nbut her values were way too different from Shuri's.%K%P
'Oh, where's your sari? If you put that on,\nthe outfit might look a little more demure.'%K%P
'Okay, I'll try it on...'%K%P
Shuri had been on the verge of tears, but Sara's\nsuggestion helped her regain her composure a little.%K%P
'That looks wonderful!'%K%P
Sara applauded the new addition to the ensemble.%K%P
I think she tried to sound extra enthusiastic to avoid\nmaking Shuri too insecure to wear the outfit.%K%P
'Hmm... Seems less naughty now. Boooring.'%K%P
'Good, I wouldn't want it to look too lewd...'%K%P
Kagura's disinterest seemed to reassure Shuri.%K%P
Maybe the outfit was less explicit now,\nbut it was still sexy.%K%P
Actually, I liked it even better than before.\nThe look suited Shuri a lot more.%K%P
The sari covered up a lot, but the material was so\nthin that you could easily see through it.%K%P
Somehow catching a glimpse through the fabric was\nmuch more sensual than if her skin had been totally\nexposed.%K%P
'Yamato. Could you stop staring?'%K%P
'Oh, sorry. \nI was just so captivated by your beauty.'%K%P
'C-captivated? By me?'%K%P
'The sari gives you this air of mystery. \nIt makes you look a lot more like a goddess,\nnot to mention cute...'%K%P
As I spoke I felt myself blushing more and more. \nBut I carried on and did my best to boost Shuri's\nself esteem.%K%P
'I-I see... Well, if that's what you think,\nI suppose this outfit isn't so bad.'%K%P
'Geez Yamato, you're really laying it on thick.'%K%P
'I can't help it. That's just how I feel.'%K%P
'Hee hee. Well, it is important to listen\nto our human representative's opinions.\nYou may compliment me more if you like.'%K%P
'You just look so gorgeous. \nThose clothes really look good on you.'%K%P
'Hee hee. Oh, Yamato. Go on, go on...'%K%P
She sure did love getting praise.%K%P
Thanks to the improvement in Shuri's mood,\nwe managed to settle the matter of her outfit.%K%P
'Okay, I'm going to start recording.'%K%P
We'd moved to my room and were staging\nan impromptu photo shoot.%K%P
It was a good chance to create some buzz\naround Shuri's new outfit.%K%P
'Make sure to get my good side, Yamato.'%K%P
'Mine too, mine too! \nI'm not handing over the throne just yet!' %K%P
Today the duo's name had been changed\nto Kagura & Shuri (TBC), and Kagura had accordingly\ntaken over as leader.%K%P
That probably wouldn't last long once the fans\nsaw Shuri's new look.%K%P
'We don't look like we're on the same team at all. \nAre you sure this is all right?'%K%P
'Absolutely. Don't worry about it.\nIt's important for goddesses to show off their\nown individual qualities.'%K%P
Maybe designing both girls' outfits around a similar\ntheme would make them look more like a real duo.%K%P
But these two weren't going to be working together\nforever. After the qualifiers ended, they'd be\ncompeting against each other.%K%P
'You and I have really different personalities,\nso maybe it's best to emphasize that.'%K%P
'I guess so. By the way...'%K%P
'Sara, why did you get changed too?'%K%P
Shuri shot a suspicious glance at Sara.%K%P
'It's not fair if you two are the only\nones who get to dress up!'%K%P
'Not fair...?'%K%P
Shuri rolled her eyes. In an attempt to escape\nShuri's gaze, Sara hid behind me.%K%P
'I won't get in your way, okay? \nI'll stay behind Yamato, you'll never know I'm here.'%K%P
'Hold on a minute, Sara...'%K%P
That plan was all well and good,\nbut she was awfully close.%K%P
The sweet fragrance of her perfume and\nher soft body against mine was going to distract me.%K%P
'Well, carry on!'%K%P
'I suppose it's fine as long as you\nkeep out of the shot...'%K%P
Despite their own charms, Kagura and Shuri\nwere pretty intimidated by the superstar aura\nSara emitted.%K%P
I think it made them both more aware of\nwhat kind of level they'd need to reach in future.%K%P
'How does she manage to look that sexy?\nShe's showing much less skin than me and Shuri...'%K%P
'Even I'm feeling a little spellbound by her...'%K%P
I could practically hear the other girls'\nunvoiced complaints.%K%P
'Oh, looks like your new outfit is a big hit, Shuri!'%K%P
We got a lot more comments than before. \nI guess we could call this development a success.%K%P
'And it's not just Shuri's, I guess this counts\nas announcing Kagura's, too.'%K%P
She'd posted photos before but this was the first\ntime she'd uploaded a video of herself in costume\nsince forming the duo.%K%P
'Lots of people say it's sexy...'%K%P
These outfits were in a completely different\nleague than the altogether less revealing uniforms.%K%P
